results.adx_keywords: Power Failures and Blackouts;Electric Light and Power;Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates);Heating;Natural Gas;Abbott, Gregory W (1957- );Texas
results.byline: By Giulia McDonnell Nieto del Rio, Nicholas Bogel-Burroughs and Ivan Penn
results.title: His Lights Stayed on During Texas’ Storm. Now He Owes $16,752.
results.abstract: After a public outcry from people like Scott Willoughby, whose exorbitant electric bill is soon due, Gov. Greg Abbott said lawmakers should ensure Texans “do not get stuck with skyrocketing energy bills” caused by the storm.
